website_summaries.verdict: A quality, nourishing lip balm your guests will love.
pros: Includes shea butter, beeswax, avocado oil, and other hydrating ingredients that leave lips soft
Aesthetic gold and pink labels with fun message

customer_reviews.title: Huge Hit! :)
customer_reviews.text: These were a huge hit at my sister's bachelorette! I put them in little "recovery kit" drawstring bags and passed them out as party favors. The girls went crazy over them. It's actually decent chapstick too, not just something cute! You won't regret buying these. :) Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: yb

customer_reviews.title: Good quality lip balm that applies well and tastes good
customer_reviews.text: These lip balms are so cute. They were used as favors for a bachelorette party along with a few other items. They were actually very good quality. They applied well and the flavor was good without being overpowering. I would definitely order these again in the future for a similar event or party.
customer_reviews.author: BrownEyedGirl87

customer_reviews.title: Still using 16 months later
customer_reviews.text: It’s now 16 months after the bachelorette party and I still have friends whipping these out using them. They’re nice and greasy!!! Which is what I like in a chapstick
customer_reviews.author: Mkkdig

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture - plus the chapstick is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: A HUGE HIT!!! I gave these out for a bachelorette. I assumed they’d be super cheap chapstick but thought they looked cute. Nope - this chapstick is amazing!! All the girls actually told me they use it as their main chapstick in their purse now. They look exactly like the picture and are super cute Party favors!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful exactly what the description says
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful exactly what the description says. I bought them for my daughter's bridal shower favors this coming weekend I'm sure everyone is going to love them. They are so pretty I don't even want to give them away I highly recommend. 💚💛💜❤️💙
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Archila

customer_reviews.title: Lip balm
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! They came neatly wrapped and the quality is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Cute packaging and great use.
customer_reviews.text: The cutest packaging, plus a great price for the outstanding quality. I could actually tell this chapstick worked compared to traditional store bought brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kiley Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and functional. Perfect for my bachelorette party! The price is also great for those on a budget. Highly recommend! My only wish is that the coverings come with options (i.e. different sayings on each chapstick).
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fun take away gift
customer_reviews.text: These are a fun gift! They are cherry flavored basic lip balm with a label attached. Nice enough fun gift. As expected!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute for Bachelorette parties
customer_reviews.text: Super fun addition to a “Thank you for coming” gift to those who attended my bachelorette party. It’s not a high quality, long-lasting chapstick, but it was more for presentation instead of quality.
customer_reviews.author: jme44vbc

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a cute gift to give girls at a bachelorette party. I used these as part of their weekend gift package. The chapstick smells really good and works great as a chapstick. I had girls asking if there were any left over because they wanted additional ones to take home. I use it daily and get reminded of what a great weekend we had celebrating the bride.
customer_reviews.author: MVTTC4393

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know what to expect but I do love them! Very nice chapstick, smells nice and goes on smooth. It isn’t sticky, you wouldn’t expect a bulk, cheap, bachlorette styled chapstick would be so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gift bags!
customer_reviews.text: These were adorable and the chapstick itself is super smooth! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bridal shower!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my friend's bridal shower - they were a huge hit! I included them with pink nail polish, a manicure kit and pink candies. It was the perfect addition. They smell outstanding and work like normal chapstick brands. Love them and would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: CaitlinKH

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my bachelorette party and they’re great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goodie bags fillers
customer_reviews.text: These were a great hit first the girls goodie bags on the bachelorette party weekend. We all loved it

customer_reviews.title: Labeling
customer_reviews.text: They did not come in with the right saying on them

customer_reviews.title: These are adorable and make an awesome bridal shower prize for games
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and make an awesome bridal shower prize for games! As soon as I received my first order I immediately ordered two more sets! So cute!!! Everyone loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bachelorette goody bag gift
customer_reviews.text: Chapstick isn’t too oily or greesy doesn’t change your lip color. Good bachelorette goody bag gift

customer_reviews.title: Great for the $$

customer_reviews.title: Loved these! Affordable and perfect party favor
customer_reviews.text: Loved these! Affordable and perfect party favor. Good price for the amount of sticks and very good quality chap stick. Would buy again!

customer_reviews.title: True to description

customer_reviews.title: Cute & good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as part of favor bag for bachelorette party. Better quality than I anticipated! Super cute & they actually work great & have a fun scent/flavor like cherry. Definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Kissing the single life goodbye lip balm is a good quality lip balm.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the “kissing the single life goodbye” lip balm for a bachelorette weekend gift bag. It was a great addition to the gift bag!

customer_reviews.title: not only are these adorable gifts but they smell amazing
customer_reviews.text: Can I just say, not only are these adorable gifts but they smell amazing! Probably one of my favorite chapsticks! I'm highly impressed.

customer_reviews.title: Soft lips with a little shine
customer_reviews.text: These are great lip balms! I thought they were going to be low quality chap sticks but they make my lips so soft and give them a little shine!

customer_reviews.text: Our shower guests loved these! The design was perfect and the flavor was good.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a bridal shower favor!!
customer_reviews.text: I was in charge of doing the party favors for my brothers wife bridal shower and these were such a big hit! I received so many compliments and the bride herself loved them! They are normal lip balm and a very cute sticker and I put it with nail polish in a cute tulle bag.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: When I received these, more than half of them were broken. The lids were cracked or completely broken off.

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: Lip balms were a blast. They came in handy and smelled really good.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not in cute packaging. Photo misleading.
customer_reviews.text: No:( Cover photo misleading. Will be returning. The cover photo is misleading. It looks like they are attached to a cute card. I purchased because I wanted something with a slogan in my wedding colors. These are not attached to a card but the cover photo shows the sticker for the tube of gloss lifted up so it could be read. My mistake, but it was an honest one. I thought each gloss was attached to packaging and had the writing "kissing the single life goodbye". :( Bummer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the lip balm is actually good, too
customer_reviews.text: Cute design for bachelorette party, and the lip balm is actually good, too! I actually like it better than Chapstick brand!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: They were a hit! Good quality and good priced party favor :)
customer_reviews.text: I am really really happy with this chapstick I ordered for my sisters Bridal Shower. I do not normally like "cherry" flavored/scented things, but I thought since these were very adorable for what I needed as a party favor, cute packaging and reasonably priced, I went ahead and ordered them. I ended up having several left over after people left the party and I was ecstatic to find out the quality of the chapstick and the minimal cherry flavor/scent were perfect for me. The chapstick left my lips nice and smoothly well hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Straite

customer_reviews.title: Great last minute party favor if you don't need a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Convenient last minute party favor. I didn't actually use the product because I have multiple lip balms already but at the last minute I was searching for a party favor and these were perfect as the quantity was too many and it shipped quickly. I've ordered party favors on sites specifically for favors and you have to pick out design, wait for it to be made and shipped, and cost depends on quantity. I just need 10 favors fast that had right theme and these worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Bachelorette Favor
customer_reviews.text: These were a perfect addition to my goody bags at the bachelorette party. They smell great and you can even read every ingredient listed. Everyone loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Foels

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Items as described and will be perfect for bachelorette bags I'm putting together.

customer_reviews.title: These are the perfect party favor for a bachelorette party
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect party favor for a bachelorette party. They arrived 1 day after I ordered without issue! Impressive! And the chapstick is good quality and smells divine. All the bridesmaids were using them. We couldn't believe the quality! Labels stayed on without issue. Definitely recommend and would order again from Botanical Bars.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Love!

product_meta.title: 12 Bridal Shower Lip Balms - Bachelorette Party Favors - Kissing the Single Life Goodbye - Gold Glitter Bridal Shower
product_meta.description: Color:White Tube CherryBridal Shower Lip Balms: Lip balms make great favors for any event. They are a practical gift that everyone can use! These lip balms have a gold glitter look at the top and gold glitter text. The background is a blush pink color. It says "Kissing the Single Life Goodbye". You will receive 12 lip balms per order. The flavor is great for both men and women! Made from soybean oil, sunflower oil, beeswax, hemp oil, avocado oil, jojoba oil, cocoa butter, shea butter, vitamin e, and aloe vera, our lip balms nourish and soften lips. They also have an SPF of 15!
feature_bullets: 12 Kissing the Single Life Goodbye Lip Balms
Includes 12 lip balms wrapped in the label shown in photo.
Perfect favor for your bridal shower or bachelorette party.
Says "Kissing the Single Life Goodbye", Each lip balm comes wrapped in the label shown in the photo.
